Name: First of July
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Rich blackberry fruit with a hint of grapefruit acidity.
History: Created on 1st of July by David Guidi at Morton's, London, England.
